text: On Father's Day, social media was full of friends thanking their fathers and father figures. Naturally, on this very big day for dads, celebrities joined in too, wishing spouses and dads a very Happy Father's Day. Here some of the very cute Father's Day wishes from celebs. Blake Lively Actress Blake Lively shared a photo of her husband, Ryan Reynolds, with their daughter, James. ` ` Since the day our baby was born, I've felt so strongly in my heart that you were most likely the father,'' Lively joked.
